https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7MuBpmIA5xS65QXxMj8ORaiWGFp.jpg Despite his marginal and extrovert looks, Jérémie is a shy teenager who keeps a heavy secret: his homosexuality. While trying to find his way between his classmate and sexual fantasy Damien and his very generous but protective mother Gina, his life is about to change. Cappuccino
